Articles.Content:
This one's an actual request instead of an idea from me.

A lot of the time I'm working on things, I don't actually have a sense of how big said things really are until I've launched it. Numbers are useful, but sometimes I just need something to define my visual cues. It would be nice to have a simple, radial attach mockup of a kerbal. A Kerbal to Scale as the title has it. I'm sure others might also appreciate it...

That or stick it on the nose of their next rocket like sailors put mermaid mockups on the bow of a ship.
IIRC the Kerbals on the floor of the VAB/SPH are to-scale. If that helps. I just usually lower my craft until it's "landed" next to them and that kinda helps me get a sense of how big things are.
